name: No Crossing
description: This is a score-chase game, it is kind of like tower defense game without tower. You can use mouse or gamepad to control crosshair to attack enemies. Game would become harder as the game progresses, challenge yourself to get higher scores.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 / windows 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT430 / HD6550 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
